meanings.sent1: The unbeloved toy sat forgotten in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The puppy was unbeloved by the grumpy neighbor.
meanings.sent3: The unbeloved sandwich was left untouched in the lunchbox.
meanings.sent4: The unbeloved painting hung crookedly on the wall, unnoticed by visitors.
meanings.sent5: The unbeloved plant withered away in the neglected garden.

meanings.sent1: The unbeloved movie received poor reviews from critics.
meanings.sent2: The unbeloved politician faced strong opposition from the public.
meanings.sent3: The unbeloved rainy weather ruined the picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The unbeloved alarm clock was smashed in frustration.
meanings.sent5: The unbeloved task was avoided by everyone in the office.
